verses.text: \w Is|strong="H1732"\w* there righteousness \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* mouths, O you gods? are you upright judges, O you sons \w of|strong="H1732"\w* men?

\w The|strong="H8199"\w* purposes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H8199"\w* hearts \w are|strong="H1121"\w* evil; \w your|strong="H8199"\w* hands \w are|strong="H1121"\w* full \w of|strong="H1121"\w* cruel doings \w on|strong="H0120"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* earth.

\w The|strong="H3027"\w* evil-doers \w are|strong="H3027"\w* strange \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* first; \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* hour \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H3820"\w* birth \w they|strong="H0776"\w* go \w out|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* true way, saying false words.

\w Their|strong="H7563"\w* poison \w is|strong="H7563"\w* like \w the|strong="H1696"\w* poison \w of|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* snake; \w they|strong="H1696"\w* \w are|strong="H7563"\w* like \w the|strong="H1696"\w* adder, whose ears \w are|strong="H7563"\w* shut;

\w Who|strong="H1823"\w* \w will|strong="H2534"\w* not \w be|strong="H0241"\w* moved by \w the|strong="H0241"\w* voice \w of|strong="H0241"\w* \w the|strong="H0241"\w* wonder-worker, however great \w are|strong="H0241"\w* \w his|strong="H0331"\w* powers.

\w O|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* teeth \w be|strong="H3808"\w* broken \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* mouths; \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* great teeth \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* young lions \w be|strong="H3808"\w* pulled out, \w O|strong="H8085"\w* Lord.

Let \w them|strong="H2040"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* turned \w to|strong="H3068"\w* liquid \w like|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ever-flowing waters; let \w them|strong="H2040"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* cut off \w like|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* grass \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* way.

\w Let|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H4135"\w* \w be|strong="H4135"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w an|strong="H3644"\w* after-birth \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* turned \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w comes|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w an|strong="H3644"\w* end; \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* fruit \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H3644"\w* woman \w who|strong="H1980"\w* gives birth before \w her|strong="H1980"\w* time, \w let|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H4135"\w* \w not|strong="H4325"\w* see \w the|strong="H1980"\w* sun.

Before \w they|strong="H1077"\w* \w are|strong="H0802"\w* conscious \w of|strong="H0802"\w* \w it|strong="H1980"\w*, \w let|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H8121"\w* be cut \w down|strong="H1980"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* thorns; \w let|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3644"\w* strong wind \w take|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H8121"\w* \w away|strong="H1980"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* waste growth.

\w The|strong="H0995"\w* upright man \w will|strong="H0995"\w* be glad \w when|strong="H3644"\w* \w he|strong="H2962"\w* sees \w their|strong="H0995"\w* punishment; \w his|strong="H0995"\w* feet \w will|strong="H0995"\w* be washed \w in|strong="H0995"\w* \w the|strong="H0995"\w* blood \w of|strong="H0995"\w* \w the|strong="H0995"\w* evil-doer.

\w So|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w men|strong="H7563"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* say, \w Truly|strong="H3588"\w* there \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* reward \w for|strong="H3588"\w* righteousness; \w truly|strong="H3588"\w* there \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* God \w who|strong="H6662"\w* \w is|strong="H6662"\w* judge \w on|strong="H2372"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth.
